mapper.sql: USER_ID, USERNAME, NAME, PASSWORD, DEPT_ID, EMAIL, MOBILE, STATUS, CRATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME,SSEX,THEME,AVATAR, DESCRIPTION,is_delete,SEAT_NUMBER,VIEW_RANGE,IS_SEPERATE
mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.ssex,ur.role_id roleId,u.name,u.seat_number seatNumber, u.view_range viewRange from TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_USER u left join TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_USER_ROLE ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}
select GROUP_CONCAT(role_id SEPARATOR ',') as role_ids from TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_USER_ROLE ur where ur.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY ur.user_id
mapper.update: update TB_YOFISHDK_AUTH_USER set IS_SEPERATE = #{isSeperate} where USER_ID=#{id}
